songs.title: Win
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Yeah
TK Kravitz
TK Kravitz

[Verse 1]
It's 6AM, I flew you to Atlanta
I'm tired of FaceTime, we got shit to handle (we do)
You got some questions that I need to answer
Behind closed doors, you my dirty dancer
You what I need, you what I need
So listen when I speak, when I speak
You so lowkey that's why I got you (that's why I got you)
As a real nigga that's what I gotta do

[Chorus]
You know by now that I'm not playin'
Yeah that's cool but I'm just sayin'
Me and you gotta win, 'til the end, uh
Win, win (flex), ooh yeah
Win (flex), win, ooh yeah
Win (flex), win, ooh yeah
Win (flex), win
Me and you gotta win

[Verse 2]
I was raised different I'ma open doors for you (I do)
Your ex ain't shit, I heard he put his hands on you (fuck)
I wish I'd see him right now
I'd probably kill him right now
I feel like huntin' him down
Girl you was lost now you found
Only 'cause I'm, tryna treat like I'm 'posed to now
You the only one I'm close to now
Only one that I talk to now
They tryna fuck, I'm tryna love you
Ain't no curve, I'm tryna cuff you
When I hold you, when I touch you
Better believe that I trust you, yeah (yeah)

[Chorus]
You know by now that I'm not playin'
Yeah that's cool but I'm just sayin'
Me and you gotta win, 'til the end, uh
Win, win (flex), ooh yeah
Win (flex), win, ooh yeah
Win (flex), win, ooh yeah
Win (flex), win
Me and you gotta win

[Bridge]
Shawty you know, oh, woah
Shawty you know, oh, woah
You know, you know
Shawty you know, oh, woah

[Chorus]
You know by now that I'm not playin' (I'm not playin')
Yeah that's cool but I'm just sayin' (I'm just sayin')
Me and you gotta win, 'til the end, uh
Win, win (flex), ooh yeah
Win (flex), win, ooh yeah
Win (flex), win, ooh yeah
Win (flex), win
Me and you gotta win
